mosinstall.name: Extended Menu Pathway
mosinstall.author: Daniel Ecer
mosinstall.description: Displays a pathway (in combination with extended menu).

This Extended Menu Pathway module displays a pathway (in combination with extended menu or standalone). Please visit de.siteof.de for more details.
To use this module don't forget to publish it and follow the install instructions.

(If you like this module please consider a donation.)

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: pathway_module_position
param.label: Module Position
param.description: Module Position of Pathway to use... mosPathway is called otherwise.

param.name: parse_access_key
param.label: Parse Access Key
param.description: Defines how to parse/strip the access key markup. (The Extended Menu module need to be installed to use this parameter)

param.name: pathway_style
param.label: Pathway Style
param.option: Unchanged (further parameters will have no effect)

param.name: hide_first
param.label: Hide First Entry
param.description: The first menu item will not be rendered. (This is useful when setting the first entry to what your home page should be, but you dont want it to show.)
